To add deadlines, Stepik needs permission to access your calendar. The app doesn\'t change or read your events.

The App supports viewing videos online, but to view the lessons without an Internet connection you\'ll need to download them. Most of the space is taken by the video tutorials. Deleting all downloaded videos can take a few minutes.
The SD card is not plugged into the device. To save videos to the SD card, plug it into the phone and restart the App.
You can save lessons on an SD-card or the internal memory of your device. Please note that when saving on an SD-card, lessons will not be available if you remove the card.
All previously downloaded videos will be transferred and new videos will be downloaded in the new location. The operation may take a few minutes. Are you sure?
Sorry, the course cannot be found
To continue, you should be authorized. Do you want to do this now?
Sorry, you cannot delete this comment

Modules in this course have deadlines. To complete this course and get a certificate, add deadlines to your calendar and get a reminder 2 days before the due date. To manage the appearance of this message go to the app settings.

Congratulations!\n\nYou have successfully completed the course!
This course is not supported in adaptive mode
Welcome to adaptive course. During this course you\'ll receive tasks depending on your answers and reactions. Let\'s look how is it work.

Imagine that this card contains some hard question and you don\'t know the answer. You can postpone hard questions by swiping the card to the right.

Try swiping this card to the right.

Now imagine that this card contains a very easy question. You can skip it by swiping card to the left. You\'ll never see it again.

Try to swipe this card to the left.
You can disable adaptive courses in settings (Settings -> Other -> Adaptive courses) and continue studying in normal mode.
